results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reason: Encourages trust in the Lord above our own understanding.
results.reflection: Trusting in the Lord wholeheartedly leads to His guidance and direction.

results.text: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.
results.reason: Highlights the superiority of trusting in the Lord over trusting in people.
results.reflection: Trusting in God provides a secure refuge that human relationships cannot offer.

results.text: You will keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in you.
results.reason: Emphasizes the peace that comes from trusting in the Lord.
results.reflection: Trusting in God leads to a deep sense of peace and security in the midst of life's uncertainties.

results.text: Fear of man will prove to be a snare, but whoever trusts in the Lord is kept safe.
results.reason: Warns against the dangers of trusting in people over God.
results.reflection: Trusting in the Lord ensures true safety and protection.

results.text: But blessed is the one who trusts in the Lord, whose confidence is in him.
results.reason: Declares the blessings that come from trusting in the Lord.
results.reflection: True blessing and confidence come from placing our trust in God.
